revisionDesc.change: removed spaces surrounding em-dashes and inserted space between initials
checked file for values of @facs, further revised header information, revised encoding
changes to TEI header, including punctuation of titles and replacing initials with full names when possible

body.ab: I have the honor to acknowledge the receipt of your letter of the 22d inst., with accompanying papers, all relating to the case of George T. Risinger, arising under the Internal Revenue laws.

The terms of compromise recommended by the Commissioner of Internal Revenue, are, that "the case be dismissed, the claimant paying 'all costs,' as proposed, including twenty dollars, District Attorney's fee." I assent to the recommendation of the Commissioner—but I respectfully suggest this single modification,—that whatever fee is legally due the District Attorney in the case, to be taxed in the usual manner, be paid, whether this fee be greater or less than twenty dollars.
